content: The publisher currently validates that each group in a MeasureReport, if it specifies a code, matches the code for the corresponding group in the Measure. However, for the Risk Adjustment use case, we are using MeasureReport to communicate the results of applying a risk adjustment model, but we aren't (yet) using the Measure to specify the risk adjustment model computably, so the Measure doesn't have any groups, but the MeasureReport will have groups for each HCC code that applies to the patient. Can the validation be relaxed so that it's only a violation if the Measure _has_ groups specified? @Grahame Grieve

@Grahame Grieve could you please take a look at this and review the PR submitted by @Rob Reynolds ? The DaVinci Risk Adjustment IG will be going to ballot in this January cycle and this is a blocking issue. Thank you! cc: @Lloyd McKenzie
Rob just let me know the PR was approved today. Thank you @Grahame Grieve
